wikipedia_page.main: Alan Rankle (born 1952 in Oldham, England) is a British artist and is part of the duo Rankle & Reynolds. During a thirty-year career he has worked primarily as a painter. He explores social and environmental issues of the day through Landscape Art.

response: The gallery holds work by local artists including Helen Bradley, William Stott and Alan Rankle and its collections include work by British artists L. S. Lowry, John William Waterhouse and Bridget Riley. In recent years the gallery has built up a collection of studio pottery and displays ceramic works by modern makers.

Gibson also works with The Hunt Cult, a loose collective of filmmakers and artists, and collaborates with artist Alan Rankle on installation projects which have featured in several galleries and museums in the UK and abroad. He also runs The Hastings 5-day Film Challenge with fellow filmmaker Emmett Ives.

There is a galleried landing from which the plasterwork can be viewed more closely: there is a deep relief of female busts, a lion's head and scrollwork. In Richard Beckford's time, the panels would almost certainly have held oil paintings,  probably of members of his large family.  Their places are now occupied by paintings by the artist Alan Rankle.
